description.narrative: Sector: Rice Beneficiaries: 693 (386 women) Description: The group seeks to continue to increase the quality and quantity of hulled rice and by-products through further increases in yields; increase the percentage of members' total production purchased by the coop for processing; construct an additional warehouse, buy another mill to increase the amount of paddy rice being hulled, begin a warrantage system (improved financial system and yearlong storage), and increase marketing skills.

title.narrative: Capacity Building of Cooperative Babiri Barutumwe

description.narrative: Sector: Coffee.Beneficiaries: 1606.Description: Cooperative Babiri Baruta Umwe is a coffee cooperative headquartered on Gatare hill, Kivyuka zone of Musigati Commune in Bubanza Province. The group seeks to improve the quantity and quality of coffee produced by its members and access a better market by constructing a warehouse and pre-drying warehouse, conducting trainings on good agricultural practices, post-harvest processing, and marketing. The group also seeks to improvement their management and leadership's capacity for organizational and financial management by hiring experienced staff (accountant, agronomist), and developing a business plan.

description.narrative: The project funds will be used to augment its revenue through increased rice production by learning and applying modern rice production and processing techniques; obtaining better warehousing facilities as well as sensitizing members about effective marketing and negotiation techniques. Funds willbe used for a storage facility; farming tools; a vehicle; hiring staff; and trainings on agricultural production and leadership and management.

description.narrative: Sector: Agriculture Beekeeping (Self-help Grant).Beneficiaries: 149 small scale farmers, of which 139 are women.This small grant beekeeping project will help 149 people to earn increased income from the production and processing of honey. USADF funds will be use to purchase construction supplies (rubble, bricks, cement, steel plates), for the warehouse and the small storage unit, bee hives, and beekeeping equipment (protection masks, smokers, extractors, honey tanks).
